Lyric:
[00:11.620]I’m livin’ in the 21st century
[00:13.810]Doin’ something mean to it
[00:15.500]Do it better than anybody you ever seen do it
[00:18.500]Screams from the ’80s, got a nice ring to it
[00:21.750]I guess every superhero need his own theme music
[00:25.000]No one man should have all that power
[00:28.120]The clock’s tickin’, I just count the hours
[00:30.440]Stop trippin’, I’m trippin’ off the power
[00:34.370]（21st century schizoid man）
[00:37.560]The system broken, the schools closed, the prisons open
[00:40.680]We ain’t got nothin’ to lose, ma’fucka, we rollin’
[00:44.000]Huh? Ma’f*cka, we rollin’
[00:47.180]With some light-skinned girls and some Kelly Rowlands
[00:49.190]In this white man world, we the ones chosen
[00:53.130]So goodnight, cruel world, I see you in the mornin’
[00:56.560]Huh? I see you in the mornin’
[00:59.620]This is way too much, I need a moment
[01:01.370]No one man should have all that power
[01:05.560]The clock’s tickin’, I just count the hours
[01:08.690]Stop trippin’, I’m trippin’ off the power
[01:11.810]‘Til then, fuck that, the world’s ours
[01:15.750]And then they
[01:16.440]And then they
[01:18.940]And then they
[01:20.500]And then they
[01:24.190]（21st century schizoid man）
[01:27.250]F*ck SNL and the whole cast
[01:29.810]Tell ‘em Yeezy said they can kiss my whole ass
[01:32.880]More specifically, they can kiss my asshole
[01:35.880]I’m an asshole? You n*ggas got jugs
[01:39.880]You short-minded n*ggas’ thoughts is Napoleon
[01:42.000]My furs is Mongolian, my ice, brought the Dodies in
[01:46.130]Now I embody every characteristic of the egotistic
[01:48.130]He know, he so, f*ckin’ gifted
[01:52.750]I just needed time alone, with my own thoughts
[01:55.060]Got treasures in my mind, but couldn’t open up my own vault
[01:58.250]My childlike creativity, purity and honesty
[02:01.370]Is honestly being prodded by these grown thoughts
[02:04.880]Reality is catchin’ up with me
[02:07.190]Takin’ my inner child, I’m fighting for it, custody
[02:09.690]With these responsibilities that they entrusted me
[02:12.810]As I look down at my dia-mond-encrusted piece
[02:15.440]N*gga, no one man should have all that power
[02:20.560]The clock’s tickin’, I just count the hours

[02:37.630]And then they
[02:39.070]（21st century schizoid man）
[02:42.190]Holy, powers, Austin, Powers
[02:45.000]Lost in translation with a whole f*ckin’ nation
[02:47.880]They say I was the obamanation of Obama’s nation
[02:49.940]Well, that’s a pretty bad way to start the conversation
[02:53.190]At the end of day, goddammit, I’m killin’ this sh*t
[02:57.880]I know damn well y’all feelin’ this shit

[03:04.750]I ain’t gotta power trip, who you goin’ home with?
[03:07.440]How ‘Ye doin’? I’m survivin’
